title: Canyonlands National Park: Minimum Impact Video
body: This Fragile Desert        Tread lightly! There are many things you can do to help preserve Canyonlands while you're in the park. NPS Photo by Neal Herbert   Â    Headed to Canyonlands? There are many things you can do to help preserve the park during your stay. This ten minute video highlights several techniques for minimizing your impact while on the trail, road or river. The files below are in the public domain and may be downloaded and shared freely. For best results, save a file to your hard drive before viewing (right-click on the link and select "save target as" from the menu). Video for Windows/PC Videos in WMV format can be opened in Winamp, Windows Media Player and other video players. This Fragile Desert - low quality [11 MB wmv file] This Fragile Desert - medium quality [26 MB wmv file] Video for iPod/Mac Videos in MP4 format can be opened in Quicktime, iTunes and other video players. These files can also be played on iPods. This Fragile Desert [30 MB mp4 file]
